name: test_mattermost_db
description:
Deploy Mattermost to test the 'db' relation.

    Mattermost needs TLS enabled on PostgreSQL to correctly connect to it.

    Args:
        ops_test: The ops test framework
descriptionHtml:
Deploy Mattermost to test the 'db' relation.

Mattermost needs TLS enabled on PostgreSQL to correctly connect to it.

Args:
    ops_test: The ops test framework

items.statusDetails:
AssertionError: TLS is not being used on pg_rewind connections
assert 'connection authorized: user=rewind database=postgres SSL enabled' in '/var/log/postgresql/postgresql-2_0148.log:2024-08-20 01:48:20 UTC [571]: user=operator,db=postgres,app=[unknown],client=10.1.0.41,line=5 LOG:  statement: GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON DATABASE postgres TO "rewind";\n/var/log/postgresql/postgresql-2_0154.log:2024-08-20 01:54:35 UTC [3214]: user=operator,db=postgres,app=[unknown],client=10.1.0.41,line=4 LOG:  statement: CREATE TABLE pgrewindtest (testcol INT);\n'
